title: MEDICAID DATA WAREHOUSE- GO BOND
description: One of the comments made by the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) during the MMIS certification exit conference was that the District was one of the few states that lacked a Medicaid data warehouse. Utilizing a data warehouse for data analysis and trending would greatly improve the Districtâ€™s ability to manage the Medicaid program. In order to facilitate more efficient Medicaid program administration and support intelligent decision-making, DHCF needs a Medicaid Data Warehouse (MDW) to provide easy access to Medicaid program data from the Medicaid Management Information System (MMIS) through the use of analytical reporting tools.
justification: The District must begin to maintain a warehouse with the ability to pull information electronically.
related_projects: MPM04C-MEDICAID DATA WAREHOUSE, MPM03C-MMIS UPGRADED SYSTEM
